result.title: Intensive School
result.description: An intensive 3day school on Urban Freight Transport and City Logistics will be organised during the reflection period of phase 3 in months 1924 Involved researchers will attend these events along with researchers and practitioners from partner organisations and early career researchers from outside the network to disseminate the reach of the project outcomes to date the intensive school opportunities will be advertised at relevant conferences and through appropriate academic networks Invitations will be made to a number of worldleading scholars in the field of city logistics in order to provide additional training on cuttingedge research
